snippet.title: Future Unfolding Trailer
snippet.description:
US/Canada: ESRB rating Everyone (E) with Mild Fantasy Violence 
Europe: PEGI 7 for Fear

http://www.futureunfolding.com

Future Unfolding is an action adventure that is all about exploration. Your goal is to unfold the mysteries and secrets hidden in the beautiful landscapes around you. There are no tutorials, and no one is telling you what to do. You discover the surreal, dream-like world and its possibilities on your own.

Trailer by Matt Chandronait / Area 5.

Created with the support of Medienboard Berlin-Brandenburg and the Creative Europe Programme - MEDIA of the European Union.
